abstract: BHP Billiton on Monday mapped out its plan for acquiring rival Rio Tinto, promising to hand shareholders $30 billion via a share buyback if the deal goes through, in the hope of drawing Rio’s board into talks.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton on Monday mapped out its plan for acquiring rival Rio Tinto, promising to hand shareholders $30 billion via a share buyback if the deal goes through, in the hope of drawing Rio’s board into talks.

headline.main: BHP Outlines Details of Rio Tinto Bid
